entry.title: $2314 // NO FEE 2BR--1 Month Free--Prospect Park--2/5/Q Trains
entry.content:
NO FEE * ONE MONTH FREE* 10 mins to Prospect Park * $2314+

The Ballgreen Complex features all of the amenities you've come to expect from new developments, but with the added bonus of being a short walk away from Prospect Park.

*2/5 Train is 7 mis walk away; the Q a 10 mins walk

*Nearby Flatbush Avenue is teeming with deliciously hip restaurants (Midwood Flats, Honey Badger, Silver Rice, Lincoln Tavern, BlueBird, Kulushkat, El Patron, Greenhouse Cafe, Rizbo...), bars (Irv's, Westbury Inn, Parkside...) and Cafe's (Blessings, Cinnamon Girl, Bergen Bagels...)

*10 minutes to proximity to Prospect Park!

Unit & Building Features:

*Fitness Center
*Lounge
*Roof Top
*Laundry Room
*Elevator
*Air Conditioning
*Gorgeous Tiles
*Stainless Steel Appliances & Granite Counter Tops
*Hardwood Floors
*Beautiful Windows

+Advertised rent is Net Effective and actors in one free month over 18 month leasing period; regular monthly rent is $2450. 12 MONTH LEASES ARE AVAILABLE+

Prospect Lefferts Gardens, Prospect Park South, Crown Heights, Flatbush, Prospect Park, Flatbush Avenue, 2 Train, 5 Train, Q Train, B Train, _Brooklyn_Living_

entry.title: $2420 // Elevator Private Parking Laundry Gym Roof Flatbush Winthrop
entry.content:
Flatbush, Brooklyn.

Pets Upon Approval. Nearby subway stations include: Winthrop St, Parkside Av. Get luxury amenities in a historic neighborhood! Two block from the park and situated directly on the border of Flatbush and Prospect Lefferts Gardens. Convenient for several train lines and very short walking distance to neighborhood nightlife. A short walk to Cortelyou Road or several venues in Prospect Lefferts Gardens. Some of our favorites include Bluebird, Greenlight Books, Record City. *Price is net effective. Call us to set up showings today!

Hardwood Floors
Video Intercom
Elevator
Laundry in building
Gym
Lounge
Private parking
Outdoor Space
Roof access
Wheelchair Accessible


Text Andrew to set up viewing show contact info.

Plus be sure to ask me about my other similar listings!
